Question: What are the names of all customers who made purchases in 2011?
SQL: SELECT DISTINCT Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId WHERE strftime('%Y', Invoice.InvoiceDate) = '2011' ORDER BY Customer.LastName

Question: Which tracks have never been purchased?
SQL: SELECT Track.Name, Track.TrackId FROM Track LEFT JOIN InvoiceLine ON Track.TrackId = InvoiceLine.TrackId WHERE InvoiceLine.InvoiceLineId IS NULL

Question: What is the average invoice amount by country?
SQL: SELECT BillingCountry, AVG(Total) AS AverageAmount FROM Invoice GROUP BY BillingCountry ORDER BY AverageAmount DESC

Question: Which media type has generated the most revenue?
SQL: SELECT MediaType.Name, SUM(InvoiceLine.UnitPrice * InvoiceLine.Quantity) AS Revenue FROM MediaType JOIN Track ON MediaType.MediaTypeId = Track.MediaTypeId JOIN InvoiceLine ON Track.TrackId = InvoiceLine.TrackId GROUP BY MediaType.MediaTypeId ORDER BY Revenue DESC LIMIT 1

Question: How many playlists does each track appear in?
SQL: SELECT Track.Name, COUNT(PlaylistTrack.PlaylistId) AS PlaylistCount FROM Track LEFT JOIN PlaylistTrack ON Track.TrackId = PlaylistTrack.TrackId GROUP BY Track.TrackId ORDER BY PlaylistCount DESC

Question: Find all employees who have sold over $100 to a single customer
SQL: SELECT DISTINCT Employee.FirstName, Employee.LastName FROM Employee JOIN Customer ON Employee.EmployeeId = Customer.SupportRepId JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId GROUP BY Employee.EmployeeId, Customer.CustomerId HAVING SUM(Invoice.Total) > 100 ORDER BY Employee.LastName

Question: Which albums don't have a track that costs more than $1?
SQL: SELECT DISTINCT Album.Title FROM Album JOIN Track ON Album.AlbumId = Track.AlbumId GROUP BY Album.AlbumId HAVING MAX(Track.UnitPrice) <= 1

Question: List all tracks along with their album and artist names
SQL: SELECT Track.Name AS TrackName, Album.Title AS AlbumTitle, Artist.Name AS ArtistName FROM Track JOIN Album ON Track.AlbumId = Album.AlbumId JOIN Artist ON Album.ArtistId = Artist.ArtistId

Question: What percentage of tracks in the database are audio files?
SQL: SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN MediaType.Name LIKE '%audio%' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) AS AudioPercentage FROM Track JOIN MediaType ON Track.MediaTypeId = MediaType.MediaTypeId

Question: Which customer spent the most in the first quarter of 2010?
SQL: SELECT Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName, SUM(Invoice.Total) AS TotalSpent FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId WHERE Invoice.InvoiceDate BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2010-03-31' GROUP BY Customer.CustomerId ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC LIMIT 1

Question: List the number of customers supported by each employee
SQL: SELECT Employee.FirstName, Employee.LastName, COUNT(Customer.CustomerId) AS CustomerCount FROM Employee LEFT JOIN Customer ON Employee.EmployeeId = Customer.SupportRepId GROUP BY Employee.EmployeeId ORDER BY CustomerCount DESC

Question: Which genres have the highest average track price?
SQL: SELECT Genre.Name, AVG(Track.UnitPrice) AS AveragePrice FROM Genre JOIN Track ON Genre.GenreId = Track.GenreId GROUP BY Genre.GenreId ORDER BY AveragePrice DESC

Question: Find all customers who have purchased music from Queen
SQL: SELECT DISTINCT Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId JOIN InvoiceLine ON Invoice.InvoiceId = InvoiceLine.InvoiceId JOIN Track ON InvoiceLine.TrackId = Track.TrackId JOIN Album ON Track.AlbumId = Album.AlbumId JOIN Artist ON Album.ArtistId = Artist.ArtistId WHERE Artist.Name = 'Queen'

Question: Which playlist has the most diverse genres?
SQL: SELECT Playlist.Name, COUNT(DISTINCT Track.GenreId) AS GenreCount FROM Playlist JOIN PlaylistTrack ON Playlist.PlaylistId = PlaylistTrack.PlaylistId JOIN Track ON PlaylistTrack.TrackId = Track.TrackId GROUP BY Playlist.PlaylistId ORDER BY GenreCount DESC LIMIT 1

Question: List all invoices with more than 5 line items
SQL: SELECT Invoice.InvoiceId, Invoice.CustomerId, Invoice.Total, COUNT(InvoiceLine.InvoiceLineId) AS LineItemCount FROM Invoice JOIN InvoiceLine ON Invoice.InvoiceId = InvoiceLine.InvoiceId GROUP BY Invoice.InvoiceId HAVING COUNT(InvoiceLine.InvoiceLineId) > 5

Question: What is the distribution of customers across states in the USA?
SQL: SELECT State, COUNT(*) AS CustomerCount FROM Customer WHERE Country = 'USA' GROUP BY State ORDER BY CustomerCount DESC

Question: Find tracks that appear in multiple playlists
SQL: SELECT Track.Name, COUNT(DISTINCT PlaylistTrack.PlaylistId) AS PlaylistCount FROM Track JOIN PlaylistTrack ON Track.TrackId = PlaylistTrack.TrackId GROUP BY Track.TrackId HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT PlaylistTrack.PlaylistId) > 1 ORDER BY PlaylistCount DESC

Question: Which artists have tracks in multiple genres?
SQL: SELECT Artist.Name, COUNT(DISTINCT Track.GenreId) AS GenreCount FROM Artist JOIN Album ON Artist.ArtistId = Album.ArtistId JOIN Track ON Album.AlbumId = Track.AlbumId GROUP BY Artist.ArtistId HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Track.GenreId) > 1 ORDER BY GenreCount DESC

Question: List all customers who have spent more than the average customer
SQL: WITH AverageSpend AS (SELECT AVG(CustomerTotal) AS AvgSpend FROM (SELECT Customer.CustomerId, SUM(Invoice.Total) AS CustomerTotal FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId GROUP BY Customer.CustomerId)) SELECT Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName, SUM(Invoice.Total) AS TotalSpent FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId GROUP BY Customer.CustomerId HAVING TotalSpent > (SELECT AvgSpend FROM AverageSpend) ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC

Question: What is the most common billing postal code in Germany?
SQL: SELECT BillingPostalCode, COUNT(*) AS Frequency FROM Invoice WHERE BillingCountry = 'Germany' GROUP BY BillingPostalCode ORDER BY Frequency DESC LIMIT 1

Question: Which customers have the same postal code?
SQL: SELECT c1.FirstName, c1.LastName, c2.FirstName, c2.LastName, c1.PostalCode FROM Customer c1 JOIN Customer c2 ON c1.PostalCode = c2.PostalCode WHERE c1.CustomerId < c2.CustomerId AND c1.PostalCode IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c1.PostalCode

Question: Find all tracks that are longer than the average track length
SQL: SELECT Name, Milliseconds FROM Track WHERE Milliseconds > (SELECT AVG(Milliseconds) FROM Track) ORDER BY Milliseconds DESC

Question: Which customer has purchased the most distinct artists?
SQL: SELECT Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName, COUNT(DISTINCT Artist.ArtistId) AS ArtistCount FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId JOIN InvoiceLine ON Invoice.InvoiceId = InvoiceLine.InvoiceId JOIN Track ON InvoiceLine.TrackId = Track.TrackId JOIN Album ON Track.AlbumId = Album.AlbumId JOIN Artist ON Album.ArtistId = Artist.ArtistId GROUP BY Customer.CustomerId ORDER BY ArtistCount DESC LIMIT 1

Question: List all albums that have fewer than 5 tracks
SQL: SELECT Album.Title, COUNT(Track.TrackId) AS TrackCount FROM Album JOIN Track ON Album.AlbumId = Track.AlbumId GROUP BY Album.AlbumId HAVING COUNT(Track.TrackId) < 5 ORDER BY TrackCount

Question: What's the total revenue from each year?
SQL: SELECT strftime('%Y', InvoiceDate) AS Year, SUM(Total) AS YearlyRevenue FROM Invoice GROUP BY Year ORDER BY Year

Question: Which composer has the most tracks in the database?
SQL: SELECT Composer, COUNT(TrackId) AS TrackCount FROM Track WHERE Composer IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Composer ORDER BY TrackCount DESC LIMIT 1

Question: Find customers who haven't made a purchase since 2012
SQL: SELECT Customer.* FROM Customer LEFT JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId AND Invoice.InvoiceDate >= '2012-01-01' WHERE Invoice.InvoiceId IS NULL ORDER BY Customer.LastName

Question: What's the sales trend by quarter over the last three years?
SQL: SELECT strftime('%Y', InvoiceDate) AS Year, 'Q' || ((strftime('%m', InvoiceDate) + 2) / 3) AS Quarter, SUM(Total) AS QuarterlyRevenue FROM Invoice WHERE InvoiceDate >= date('now', '-3 years') GROUP BY Year, Quarter ORDER BY Year, Quarter

Question: Which tracks appear in the most playlists?
SQL: SELECT Track.Name, COUNT(DISTINCT PlaylistTrack.PlaylistId) AS PlaylistCount FROM Track JOIN PlaylistTrack ON Track.TrackId = PlaylistTrack.TrackId GROUP BY Track.TrackId ORDER BY PlaylistCount DESC LIMIT 10

Question: Find all invoices that contain tracks from more than 3 different genres
SQL: SELECT Invoice.InvoiceId, COUNT(DISTINCT Track.GenreId) AS GenreCount FROM Invoice JOIN InvoiceLine ON Invoice.InvoiceId = InvoiceLine.InvoiceId JOIN Track ON InvoiceLine.TrackId = Track.TrackId GROUP BY Invoice.InvoiceId HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Track.GenreId) > 3

Question: List all customers from the USA
SQL: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE Country = 'USA'

Question: How many tracks are there in the database?
SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Track

Question: What are the total sales for 2009?
SQL: SELECT SUM(Total) FROM Invoice WHERE InvoiceDate BETWEEN '2009-01-01' AND '2009-12-31'

Question: Who are the top 5 customers by purchase amount?
SQL: SELECT Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName, SUM(Invoice.Total) AS TotalSpent FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId GROUP BY Customer.CustomerId ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC LIMIT 5

Question: How many tracks are in each genre?
SQL: SELECT Genre.Name, COUNT(Track.TrackId) AS TrackCount FROM Genre LEFT JOIN Track ON Genre.GenreId = Track.GenreId GROUP BY Genre.GenreId ORDER BY TrackCount DESC

Question: Which artists have the most albums?
SQL: SELECT Artist.Name, COUNT(Album.AlbumId) AS AlbumCount FROM Artist JOIN Album ON Artist.ArtistId = Album.ArtistId GROUP BY Artist.ArtistId ORDER BY AlbumCount DESC LIMIT 10

Question: What are the names of all playlists that contain rock music?
SQL: SELECT DISTINCT Playlist.Name FROM Playlist JOIN PlaylistTrack ON Playlist.PlaylistId = PlaylistTrack.PlaylistId JOIN Track ON PlaylistTrack.TrackId = Track.TrackId JOIN Genre ON Track.GenreId = Genre.GenreId WHERE Genre.Name = 'Rock'

Question: Find all invoices for customer 'Luís Gonçalves'
SQL: SELECT * FROM Invoice WHERE CustomerId = (SELECT CustomerId FROM Customer WHERE FirstName = 'Luís' AND LastName = 'Gonçalves')

Question: Which employee has sold the most?
SQL: SELECT Employee.FirstName, Employee.LastName, SUM(Invoice.Total) AS TotalSales FROM Employee JOIN Customer ON Employee.EmployeeId = Customer.SupportRepId JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId GROUP BY Employee.EmployeeId ORDER BY TotalSales DESC LIMIT 1

Question: What is the most popular music genre in terms of sales?
SQL: SELECT Genre.Name, COUNT(InvoiceLine.InvoiceLineId) AS Sales FROM Genre JOIN Track ON Genre.GenreId = Track.GenreId JOIN InvoiceLine ON Track.TrackId = InvoiceLine.TrackId GROUP BY Genre.GenreId ORDER BY Sales DESC LIMIT 1

Question: How many tracks has each customer purchased?
SQL: SELECT Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName, COUNT(InvoiceLine.TrackId) AS TracksPurchased FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId JOIN InvoiceLine ON Invoice.InvoiceId = InvoiceLine.InvoiceId GROUP BY Customer.CustomerId ORDER BY TracksPurchased DESC

Question: List all tracks that are longer than 5 minutes
SQL: SELECT Name, Milliseconds/60000 AS Minutes FROM Track WHERE Milliseconds > 300000 ORDER BY Milliseconds DESC

Question: Which customer spent the most in 2010?
SQL: SELECT Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName, SUM(Invoice.Total) AS TotalSpent FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId WHERE InvoiceDate BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2010-12-31' GROUP BY Customer.CustomerId ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC LIMIT 1

Question: How many customers are there in each country?
SQL: SELECT Country, COUNT(*) AS CustomerCount FROM Customer GROUP BY Country ORDER BY CustomerCount DESC

Question: What's the average length of tracks in the Rock genre?
SQL: SELECT AVG(Track.Milliseconds)/60000 AS AverageMinutes FROM Track JOIN Genre ON Track.GenreId = Genre.GenreId WHERE Genre.Name = 'Rock'

Question: Find all invoices where the billing country is different from the customer's country
SQL: SELECT Invoice.* FROM Invoice JOIN Customer ON Invoice.CustomerId = Customer.CustomerId WHERE Invoice.BillingCountry <> Customer.Country

Question: Which artist has generated the most revenue?
SQL: SELECT Artist.Name, SUM(InvoiceLine.UnitPrice * InvoiceLine.Quantity) AS Revenue FROM Artist JOIN Album ON Artist.ArtistId = Album.ArtistId JOIN Track ON Album.AlbumId = Track.AlbumId JOIN InvoiceLine ON Track.TrackId = InvoiceLine.TrackId GROUP BY Artist.ArtistId ORDER BY Revenue DESC LIMIT 1

Question: List all employees and their boss's name
SQL: SELECT E.FirstName || ' ' || E.LastName AS Employee, M.FirstName || ' ' || M.LastName AS Manager FROM Employee E LEFT JOIN Employee M ON E.ReportsTo = M.EmployeeId

Question: How many tracks were purchased more than once?
SQL: SELECT Track.Name, COUNT(InvoiceLine.InvoiceLineId) AS PurchaseCount FROM Track JOIN InvoiceLine ON Track.TrackId = InvoiceLine.TrackId GROUP BY Track.TrackId HAVING COUNT(InvoiceLine.InvoiceLineId) > 1 ORDER BY PurchaseCount DESC

Question: What's the average invoice amount by city?
SQL: SELECT BillingCity, AVG(Total) AS AverageInvoice FROM Invoice GROUP BY BillingCity ORDER BY AverageInvoice DESC

Question: Find all customers who purchased Jazz music
SQL: SELECT DISTINCT Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId JOIN InvoiceLine ON Invoice.InvoiceId = InvoiceLine.InvoiceId JOIN Track ON InvoiceLine.TrackId = Track.TrackId JOIN Genre ON Track.GenreId = Genre.GenreId WHERE Genre.Name = 'Jazz' ORDER BY Customer.LastName

Question: How many tracks does each artist have in the database?
SQL: SELECT Artist.Name, COUNT(Track.TrackId) AS TrackCount FROM Artist LEFT JOIN Album ON Artist.ArtistId = Album.ArtistId LEFT JOIN Track ON Album.AlbumId = Track.AlbumId GROUP BY Artist.ArtistId ORDER BY TrackCount DESC

Question: Which album has the most tracks?
SQL: SELECT Album.Title, COUNT(Track.TrackId) AS TrackCount FROM Album JOIN Track ON Album.AlbumId = Track.AlbumId GROUP BY Album.AlbumId ORDER BY TrackCount DESC LIMIT 1

Question: List all customers who haven't made a purchase in the last year
SQL: SELECT Customer.* FROM Customer LEFT JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId AND Invoice.InvoiceDate > date('now', '-1 year') WHERE Invoice.InvoiceId IS NULL

Question: What are the total sales for each month of 2009?
SQL: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', InvoiceDate) AS Month, SUM(Total) AS MonthlySales FROM Invoice WHERE InvoiceDate BETWEEN '2009-01-01' AND '2009-12-31' GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Month

Question: Which customers have purchased every album from their favorite artist?
SQL: WITH CustomerFavoriteArtist AS (SELECT Customer.CustomerId, Artist.ArtistId, COUNT(*) AS PurchaseCount FROM Customer JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId JOIN InvoiceLine ON Invoice.InvoiceId = InvoiceLine.InvoiceId JOIN Track ON InvoiceLine.TrackId = Track.TrackId JOIN Album ON Track.AlbumId = Album.AlbumId JOIN Artist ON Album.ArtistId = Artist.ArtistId GROUP BY Customer.CustomerId, Artist.ArtistId), ArtistAlbumCount AS (SELECT ArtistId, COUNT(DISTINCT AlbumId) AS AlbumCount FROM Album GROUP BY ArtistId) SELECT c.FirstName, c.LastName, a.Name AS ArtistName FROM CustomerFavoriteArtist cfa JOIN Customer c ON cfa.CustomerId = c.CustomerId JOIN Artist a ON cfa.ArtistId = a.ArtistId JOIN ArtistAlbumCount aac ON cfa.ArtistId = aac.ArtistId WHERE cfa.PurchaseCount = aac.AlbumCount

Question: Find all tracks not included in any playlist
SQL: SELECT Track.Name FROM Track LEFT JOIN PlaylistTrack ON Track.TrackId = PlaylistTrack.TrackId WHERE PlaylistTrack.PlaylistId IS NULL

Question: What's the most expensive track in each genre?
SQL: WITH RankedTracks AS (SELECT t.Name AS TrackName, g.Name AS GenreName, t.UnitPrice, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY t.GenreId ORDER BY t.UnitPrice DESC) as PriceRank FROM Track t JOIN Genre g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId) SELECT GenreName, TrackName, UnitPrice FROM RankedTracks WHERE PriceRank = 1 ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC

Question: Which employee has the highest sales growth from 2009 to 2010?
SQL: WITH Sales2009 AS (SELECT Employee.EmployeeId, SUM(Invoice.Total) AS Sales2009 FROM Employee JOIN Customer ON Employee.EmployeeId = Customer.SupportRepId JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId WHERE InvoiceDate BETWEEN '2009-01-01' AND '2009-12-31' GROUP BY Employee.EmployeeId), Sales2010 AS (SELECT Employee.EmployeeId, SUM(Invoice.Total) AS Sales2010 FROM Employee JOIN Customer ON Employee.EmployeeId = Customer.SupportRepId JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId WHERE InvoiceDate BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2010-12-31' GROUP BY Employee.EmployeeId) SELECT Employee.FirstName, Employee.LastName, s2010.Sales2010 - s2009.Sales2009 AS SalesGrowth FROM Employee JOIN Sales2009 s2009 ON Employee.EmployeeId = s2009.EmployeeId JOIN Sales2010 s2010 ON Employee.EmployeeId = s2010.EmployeeId ORDER BY SalesGrowth DESC LIMIT 1

Question: List all albums with their total play length in hours
SQL: SELECT Album.Title, SUM(Track.Milliseconds)/3600000.0 AS Hours FROM Album JOIN Track ON Album.AlbumId = Track.AlbumId GROUP BY Album.AlbumId ORDER BY Hours DESC
